name: Power of Will
description:
Power of Will is a game originally created for the VimJam: Collectables (8 Bits to Infinity) Game Jam. It's also my first published game!

Gameplay:

Battle your way through three floors of enemies to escape the realm you are trapped in. Collect abilities, energy, and pieces of your memory to uncover why you're here.

Controls:

Left click: Use active ability

Space: Toggle abilities

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
